name: Yuren Ju
bio: As a passionate software developer, exploring new advancements in the field has always been a focus. Previous work includes projects related to Wallet as a Service and Decentralized Finance (DeFi). The most recent project focuses on developing a system compliant with W3C DIDs (Decentralized Identifiers) and Semaphore protocols, while also integrating the official identity verification API from the Taiwanese government.
